animeDescription: A Toriko movie, the action in it takes place before the beginning of the TV series. The story follows a kid, Peck, who lives in a village attacked by a Gerold. So, he seeks the help of Toriko.
animeRelated: ['Sequel: Toriko: Jump Super Anime Tour 2009 Special']
